title: Zombie Vocalizations
description: Zombie Vocalizations sound package with 260 high-quality monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/zombie-vocalizations-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/sloYKa_LWr8

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/otd3cejc4h0jq14/MSE%20-%20Zombie%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


Our Zombies can not only growl, roar and groan, but also laugh, breathe, cough and yawn. They are just as alive as you and me!

The package was created for cases where a creature can be the main character of the game, a neutral or minor character, or an enemy.


The collection contains 23 voice actions, including 260 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 6 sounds during an attack
  • 10 biting sounds
  • 18 deaths
  • 21 growls
  • 18 pains
  • 25 roars
  • 12 snarls
  • 5 sounds of yelping
  • 15 breathing sounds
  • 3 choking sounds
  • 9 sounds of concern
  • 7 coughing sounds
  • 4 croaking sounds
  • 6 crying sounds
  • 9 exhalation sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 10 idle sounds
  • 10 sounds of interest
  • 18 sounds when jumping
  • 6 laughing sounds
  • 15 mumbling sounds
  • 7 snoring sounds
  • 13 sounds of yawning


Among the attacking type of vocalizations there are both short and long ones, the pain type vocalizations also have different lengths. The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of monsters: zombie, orc, troglodyte, mutant and other creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 260 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, mono
  • 23 voice actions
  • 83 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 47 voice samples of the pain type
  • 130 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 260

Number of Audio Cues: 260

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 7 minutes 26 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
